languages.text: Тяга к знанию и развлечениям охватила колонию, возвышая ее культурно, но дурно сказываясь на покорности и трудолюбии черни.
The colony was swept up by a thirst for knowledge and entertainment, which brought it to new cultural heights but had a negative impact on the obedience and diligence of the rabble.
languages.original_text: Тяга к знанию и развлечениям охватила колонию, возвышая ее культурно, но дурно сказываясь на покорности и трудолюбии черни.

traits.locale_text: The colony was swept up by the thirst for knowledge and entertainment, which brought it to new cultural heights but had a negative impact on the obedience and diligence of the rabble.
The colony was swept up by the thirst for knowledge and entertainment, which brought it to new cultural heights but had a negative impact on the obedience and diligence of the rabble.
The colony was swept up by a thirst for knowledge and entertainment, which brought it to new cultural heights but had a negative impact on the obedience and diligence of the rabble.
The colony was swept up by a thirst for knowledge and entertainment, which brought it to new cultural heights but had a negative impact on the obedience and diligence of the rabble.
The colony was swept up by a thirst for knowledge and entertainment, which brought it to new cultural heights but had a negative impact on the obedience and diligence of the rabble.

languages.text: La colonia se sume en un ansia de conocimiento y entretenimiento que la lleva a nuevas cotas de cultura pero tiene un efecto negativo sobre la obediencia y diligencia del populacho.
languages.original_text: The colony was swept up by a thirst for knowledge and entertainment, which brought it to new cultural heights but had a negative impact on the obedience and diligence of the rabble.

traits.locale_text: La colonia se sume en un ansia de conocimiento y entretenimiento que la lleva a nuevas cotas de cultura pero tiene un efecto negativo sobre la obediencia y diligencia del populacho.

languages.text: La fièvre de connaissance et de divertissement qui s'est emparée de toute la colonie lui a permis d'atteindre de nouveaux sommets sur le plan intellectuel, mais elle a aussi eu un impact négatif sur l'obéissance et la productivité des masses laborieuses.
languages.original_text: The colony was swept up by a thirst for knowledge and entertainment, which brought it to new cultural heights but had a negative impact on the obedience and diligence of the rabble.

traits.locale_text: La fièvre de connaissance et de divertissement qui s'est emparée de toute la colonie lui a permis d'atteindre de nouveaux sommets sur le plan intellectuel, mais elle a aussi eu un impact négatif sur l'obéissance et la productivité des masses laborieuses.

languages.text: 对知识与娱乐的渴望席卷整个殖民地，殖民地达到了前所未有的文化高度，但却对民众的顺从与勤勉产生了不利的影响。
languages.original_text: The colony was swept up by a thirst for knowledge and entertainment, which brought it to new cultural heights but had a negative impact on the obedience and diligence of the rabble.

traits.locale_text: 对知识与娱乐的渴望席卷整个殖民地，殖民地达到了前所未有的文化高度，但却对民众的顺从与勤勉产生了不利的影响。

languages.text: コロニーは知識と娯楽への渇望に押し流された。そこは新たな文化的高みに達したが、その反動として、一般市民の従順さと勤勉さには悪影響を及ぼすこととなった。
languages.original_text: The colony was swept up by a thirst for knowledge and entertainment, which brought it to new cultural heights but had a negative impact on the obedience and diligence of the rabble.

traits.locale_text: コロニーは知識と娯楽への渇望に押し流された。そこは新たな文化的高みに達したが、その反動として、一般市民の従順さと勤勉さには悪影響を及ぼすこととなった。

languages.text: Der Durst nach Wissen und Unterhaltung verbreitete sich in der gesamten Kolonie. Das führte zwar zu neuen kulturellen Höhen, wirkte sich jedoch negativ auf Gehorsam und Fleiß des Pöbels aus.
languages.original_text: The colony was swept up by a thirst for knowledge and entertainment, which brought it to new cultural heights but had a negative impact on the obedience and diligence of the rabble.

traits.locale_text: Der Durst nach Wissen und Unterhaltung verbreitete sich in der gesamten Kolonie. Das führte zwar zu neuen kulturellen Höhen, wirkte sich jedoch negativ auf Gehorsam und Fleiß des Pöbels aus.

languages.text: Kolonide eşi benzeri görülmemiş bir irfan ve eğlence iştahı doğdu. Bununla birlikte yeni kültürel doruklara ulaşılsa da ayaktakımının itaatkârlığı ve çalışkanlığı olumsuz etkilendi.
languages.original_text: The colony was swept up by a thirst for knowledge and entertainment, which brought it to new cultural heights but had a negative impact on the obedience and diligence of the rabble.
